Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BmKn1-6Lys (BmKn1 analog, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Bea Rde L, Petraglia AF, Johnson LE. 2015
Literature.Title: Synthesis, antimicrobial activity and toxicity of analogs of the scorpion venom BmKn peptides

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) toparent peptide BmKn1I=L=F=G=K: 15%.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 29213, B.cereus ATCC 11778, three Gram- bacteria: S. typhimurium ATCC 14028, E. aerogenes ATCC 13048 and E. coli ATCC 25922.Structure: random coil in water and become helical in 50% TFE.In vitro toxicity: human RBC: HC50 ~90 ug/ml, less hemolytic.
